specials.name: Blood Nourishment
specials.description: Maglap uses its three-pronged tongue to drink the blood of an adjacent restrained or unconscious creature. The creature gains drained 1.

specials.name: (R)
specials.description: Requirements Maglap is in an assumed form. Effect The faceless stalker resumes its true form. Until the start of its next turn, it gains a +2 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, saving throws, and skill checks.

specials.name: Assume Form
specials.description: (concentrate, occult, polymorph, transmutation) Maglap spends 10 minutes reshaping its appearance to take on the shape of any Small or Medium humanoid. It gains a +4 circumstance bonus to Deception checks to pass as that creature.

specials.name: Sneak Attack
specials.description: Maglap deals 1d6 extra precision damage to flat-footed creatures.
